mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply ( rno, bno, reply, replyer ) values ( seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer}, updateDate = sysdate WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate FROM tbl_reply WHERE rno = #{rno}

select * from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(tbl_reply pk_reply) */ rownum rn, RNO, BNO, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} and rno > 0 and ROWNUM <= ${cri.end} ) where rn >= ${cri.start}
